      • addMobile

        public void addMobile()
        this is the addMobile method it gets model,size from their respective text fields it also calls different methods that return price, weight and credit and then uses these values to create an instance of Mobile and add it to the gadgetList

      • addMp3

        public void addMp3()
        this is the addMp3 method. It gets model,size from their respective text fields it also calls different methods that return price, weight and memory and then uses these values to create an instance of Mp3 and add it to the gadgetList

      • displayAll

        public void displayAll()
        this is the displayAll method. It iterates through each gadget in gadgetList as it prints it's display number and also calls print method on that object to display the gadgets details

      • makeCall

        public void makeCall()
        this is the makeCall method. It gets phoneNumber from its text field, checks its validity then calls makeCall method on a Mobile class object

      • downLoadMusic

        this is the makeCall method. It gets phoneNumber from its text field, checks its validity then calls makeCall method on a Mobile class object

      • getDisplayNo

        public int getDisplayNo()
        this is the getDisplayNo method. It gets displayNumber from text field, attempts to convert it to an integer, if it succeeds, it returns it else returns -1

        int
